tours.title: Welcome to AI Voter Personas: US 2024

steps.title: Welcome!
steps.content: In this website you can: 1) See the clusters' positions across 51 questions from ANES 2024. 2) Respond a 10-question quiz and see which cluster fits you more. 3) Talk to AI-generated personas from each cluster and ask them any question about politics. All the methodology and code is available.

steps.title: Explore
steps.content: Explore the Clusters: Discover how 15 distinct voter groups position themselves across the political landscape. Toggle between 3D and 2D views, select policy dimensions to compare, and hover over clusters to see their demographics and vote shares.

steps.title: Quiz
steps.content: Respond a Quiz and Find Your Cluster: Answer 10 questions and discover which ideological cluster best matches your views.

steps.title: Chat
steps.content: Chat with an AI-Generated Voter Persona: Each cluster has a simulated persona based on real survey data. Ask them about political issues and see how different ideological groups respond.

steps.title: About
steps.content: Methodology and Validation: Learn about the clustering methodology, LLM validation experiments, and access the full code and technical documentation.
